name: Emoji Bomberman
description:
Emoji Bomberman was developed at the University of Minho.

Emoji Bomberman is a single-player game. Play against 3 superintelligent AI. You can customize your avatar with 4 different emojis and pick up power-ups.

This game was awarded the prize of the best bot AI.
The game is only available in Portuguese.

Instructions:
Change the size of the map - Below "Tamanho" you can click on the arrows to decrease or increase the size of the map
Change the avatar - Below "Avatar" you can click on the arrows to change the avatar
Start the game - Click on "COMEÇAR"
Pause the game - Click on "Pausar" or press the HOME button to stop the game
Resume the game - Click on "Voltar à partida" to resume the game
Return to the menu - Click on "Voltar ao menu" to return to the menu

Controls:
WASD - move
B or SPACE - place a bomb
HOME - pause

Power-ups:
Mushrooms - Increase number of bombs you can place at same time
Strawberries - Increase bombs radius
